title: Add a Tittle  does  riot even give out badges anymore
body: i have been collecting honor now since  the transfer to oceanic  all those months ago when they took  my honor badges away because of transfer   ism now  into the hundreds on some      and have yet to recieve a single badge  but my friend   has been playing for 2 weeks    has like 48   and get's a badge       like is there even any point trying to be a  positive player anymore

replies.body: when you transfer, they reset the amount of honours you get, but not the amount of "rating" you get from each one. so players that transferred over have such a low chance of getting a badge.
didn't know that bit. learn something new everyday. =3
yeah i got the teamwork one a while ago and there is obviously an algorithm to it not just a milestone of honors
there are plenty of reasons to be a nice player. pleasant playing environment for one. the more of us trying to be friendly the better games will be. less trolls, assholes, etc.

it depends on any and all of these factors....

1) who gave you each honor
2) how many honors they give out regularly
3) how many honors they have given YOU specifically.
4) if you are friend with the person giving honour. 

all these factors reduce the "worth" of your honors. so 250 team work may not be worth as much as you think. conversely 10 teamwork from people who you don't know and do not give out many honors may warrant a ribbon. i have gotten each one over time, but it took nearly 500 TW before i got green. however only like 30 honorable opponent got me red ribbon.


it is like this (i would assume) so you cant organize someone to get honor, it has to be earned genuinely. 
in saying that, i felt like this. with no ribbons the day before i got my first one. so hang in there. good luck. =3
